changeTheFollowingParameter: You've changed the following {quantity} parameter: | You've changed the following {quantity} parameters:

errors.nonNumeric: Does not accept non numeric values
errors.portSocket: Either port or socket need to be defined
errors.addressRequired: address is required when using port
errors.addressRequiredEmpty: address should be defined only when using port
errors.refreshLater: Please refresh in a few moments.

confirmations.maintain: Are you sure you want to set {targetId} into maintenance mode?
confirmations.clear: Are you sure you want to clear current state of {targetId}?
confirmations.drain: Are you sure you want to drain {targetId}?
confirmations.unlink: Are you sure you want to unlink {targetId}?
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete {targetId}?
confirmations.destroy: Are you sure you want to destroy {targetId}?
confirmations.stop: Are you sure you want to stop {targetId}?
confirmations.start: Are you sure you want to start {targetId}?

info.createOrUpdateForm: Empty value in non-required fields will be treated as null. *indicates required field.
info.filterDeleteModal: A filter can only be destroyed if no service uses it. This means that the data.relationships object for the filter must be empty.
info.monitorDelete: The monitor must not have relationships to any servers in order to be destroyed.
info.serverUnlink: Make sure it is not used by any services or monitors.
info.serverMaintenance: By default setting a server into maintenance mode will cause connections to be closed only after the next request is sent. Check the box below to force all connections to the server to be closed immediately
info.serviceDelete: A service can only be destroyed if the service uses no servers or filters and all the listeners pointing to the service have been destroyed.

ariaLabel.activateNone: : Not sorted. Activate to sort ascending.
ariaLabel.activateAscending: : Sorted ascending. Activate to sort descending.
ariaLabel.activateDescending: : Sorted descending. Activate to remove sorting.
ariaLabel.sortDescending: : Sorted descending. Activate to remove sorting.
ariaLabel.sortAscending: : Sorted ascending. Activate to sort descending.
ariaLabel.sortNone: : Not sorted. Activate to sort ascending.
